word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重能够栩栩如生地把事物或场景等描绘出来。
指快速地勾勒或概略地叙述。
侧重指描述细节，给读者或听众提供清晰的视觉图像。
指有代表性或象征性地描述或讲述。
指某一词字面或狭义的意思，或指某些符号或迹象的特指含义。
侧重用文字或符号表示的联想，暗示。
最普通用词。指文字或符号等所表示的各种明确的或含蓄的意义。
通常指暗含地、隐晦地表达意思。
指用文字、说话或表情等表示单纯的意思。

bilingual.target: 设计一个标志来代表它。

bilingual.source: What does the "web" in the poem represent?
What does this symbol represent about China or the Chinese people?
bilingual.target: 这个象征代表了中国或中国人民的什么？

bilingual.source: Look at the logos and decide which Chinese cities they represent.
bilingual.target: 看看这些标志并决定它们代表哪些中国城市。

bilingual.source: My students carefully chose the items in this box to represent life in 1917.
bilingual.target: 我的学生们仔细挑选了这个盒子里的物品来代表1917年的生活。

bilingual.source: She was chosen to represent her class.
bilingual.target: 她被选中代表她的班级。
这些雕像代表了不同的神灵。

bilingual.source: He will represent the company at the meeting.
bilingual.target: 他将代表公司参加会议。

bilingual.source: Would you like to represent us in the speech?
bilingual.target: 你愿意代表我们发言吗？

bilingual.source: The lawyer will represent the client in court.
bilingual.target: 律师将在法庭上代表客户。

list.abstract: represent（英 [ˌreprɪˈzent]，美 [ˌreprɪˈzent]），英语单词，作名词为代表；构成；相当于。短语搭配有represent to（代表）。例句为“He would probably represent civil servants（他可能会代表公务员）”。 represent相关近义词有conduct oneself、bear oneself等，相关反义词有prosecute。

yingyinNormal.en: He's right, Friar. Represent democracy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，弗莱尔，代表民主吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Good afternoon. Hello, hi. I represent Max's Homemade Cupcakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下午好，各位好，我代表麦克斯自制小蛋糕。

yingyinNormal.en: One animal represents each year, so totally 12 animals represent 12 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每种动物代表一年，一共12种动物代表12年。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but I represent your interests. I represent the surrogate's interests. Then start.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是为了维护你的利益，我是代表代孕者的利益的。那就帮我。

yingyinNormal.en: $10 million because this hand is meant to represent a single mortgage bond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1000万美元是因为这一局代表一个房贷债券。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you represent the investors or Merrill Lynch? The investors. You do. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你代表投资人还是美林证券投资人？是吗。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if George is owner of half the estate now, shouldn't you represent him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然乔治现在拥有一半庄园，难道你不该代表他吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Give you fat fees for doing so. But you represent the investors? Is that right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你丰厚的报酬，可你代表的是投资人？是这样的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I want to make clear, I have been hired by the Grant family to represent Jeffrey's interests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想说明白，格兰特一家雇我代表杰弗里的利益。

yingyinNormal.en: This law was passed for them. I have to represent my people the same way you do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这项法律，是为他们而出台。我得像你那样，代表人民的意愿。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to talk to him as a lawyer, a lawyer that used to represent me. Do you understand that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想跟作为律师的他聊一下，作为曾代表我的律师，你明白吗？

yingyinNormal.en: These points of light represent the constellation of nearly 6,000 generating plants we count on to power the grid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 图上显示的点代表着将近6000个发电站，有了它们，才有输电网。

yingyinNormal.en: So what I'd like you to consider is: What does it mean when these dots don't represent the individual bases of your genome, but they connect to genomes all across the planet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望你们考虑的是：如果这些点不是代表你的基因的碱基而是整个星球上基因相连，这意味着什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Look, These genomes, these 23 chromosomes, they don't in any way represent the quality of our relationships or the nature of our society, at least not yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个，这些基因组，这23个染色体它们并不代表我们人际关系的质量，或者我们这个社会的性质，至少目前还没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, we need all these case files so that we can properly represent the client's interests, and Mr. Gardner and Ms. Lockhart are actively delaying...
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，我们需要所有的案件卷宗，这样我们才能完全代表委托人的利益，加德纳先生和洛克哈特女士在故意拖延...

yingyinNormal.en: And, of course, white flags can also represent surrender, the Stewards of Gondor, and the Japanese Minamoto clan, but I'm sure you remember that from episode 62, "White Flags: Who's Waving and Why?"
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，白旗也代表"举白旗投降"，刚铎宰相，日本源氏也都使用白旗，但想必你们肯定还记得这些，因为62集"白旗，谁举白旗及缘由"都讲过。

yingyinNormal.en: It's their mistake. We have to zealously represent our client.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是他们的错，我们应热忱地为当事人代理。

yingyinNormal.en: Who better to represent you than one of your own family?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有比你的家人更合适的人选吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It's a society ball, Serena. You have to represent yourself well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑟琳娜，这是个社交舞会，你要表现得得体。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you want? We represent the Lollipop Guild, and we want you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们来干嘛？我们是棒棒糖团队，欢迎你的到来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In a number of studies, Malti and others have shown that guilt and sympathy may <highlight>represent</highlight> different pathways to cooperation and sharing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多研究中， Malti 和其他人员已经证明，内疚和同情可能代表着合作和分享的不同途径。

examination_example.sentence: While the statement is vague, it <highlight>represents</highlight> one starting point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这个声明很模糊，但它代表了一个起点。

examination_example.sentence: He would probably <highlight>represent</highlight> civil servants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他可能会代表公务员。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: be a symbol or embodiment of a particular quality or thing

examination_example.sentence: Characters that did <highlight>represent</highlight> a minority culture usually had secondary roles in the books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 代表少数民族文化的角色在书中通常都是次要角色。

examination_example.sentence: When we are bringing someone back, <highlight>representing</highlight> someone who is no longer alive on the screen, what we are doing is extremely sophisticated digital make-up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们把一个人带回来，在屏幕上代表一个已经不在人世的人时，我们所做的是极其复杂的电子数字特效化妆。

examination_example.sentence: Panini's Ancient Rome and Modern Rome <highlight>represent</highlight> the sights most prized, including celebrated Greco-Roman statues and views of famous ruins, fountains, and churches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帕尼尼(Panini)的古罗马和现代罗马代表了最受瞩目的景点，包括著名的希腊罗马雕像，著名的遗址、喷泉和教堂等景色。

sense_info_list.en: be entitled or appointed to act or speak for someone, especially in an official capacity
sense_info_list.zh: 被选为议员/代理人/发言人

examination_example.sentence: CMG Worldwide is the firm that <highlight>represents</highlight> Dean's estate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: CMG环球是代理Dean的遗产事宜的公司。

sense_info_list.en: be a specimen or example of
depict a particular subject in a picture or other work of art
sense_info_list.zh: 刻画; 描绘; 扮演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有代表性的；典型的；代表的；代议的；表现的；体现的；表象的；代表制的；代议制的；具象派的
n. 代表；有人代表的状况；描述；描写；陈述；述说；抗议；说明；声明；声称

word_family.mean: v. 代表；构成；相当于；描绘；描述；描写；明确讲述；清楚说明；体现

sense_info_list.en: be a specimen or example of

examination_example.sentence: For the bulk of our species' approximately 200,000-year lifespan, we had no means of precisely <highlight>representing</highlight> quantities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们物种大约20万年的寿命中，我们没有办法精确地表示数量。

examination_example.sentence: Such momentary thoughts were <highlight>represented</highlight> in words and passed down across generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种瞬间的想法被用文字表达出来，代代相传。

examination_example.sentence: A study of some K-12 textbooks and teacher manuals showed that Asian Americans were inadequately and improperly <highlight>represented</highlight> in them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一些K-12教科书和教师手册的研究表明，亚裔美国人其中的代表性不足且不恰当。

sense_info_list.en: be a symbol or embodiment of a particular quality or thing

examination_example.sentence: Textbooks <highlight>represent</highlight> an 11 billion dollar industry, up from $8 billion in 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书是一个价值高达110亿美元的产业，2014年时其产业价值为80亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: If all four bills pass as written, they would <highlight>represent</highlight> a substantial update of Michigan's 2013 law that allowed the testing of self-driving vehicles in limited conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这四项法案都能以书面形式通过，这就表示密西根在2013年制定的无人驾驶测试制度会发生实质性更新。

examination_example.sentence: "To me, neon <highlight>represents</highlight> memories of the past," says photographer Sharon Blance, whose series Hong Kong Neon celebrates the city's famous signs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “对我来说，霓虹灯代表着对过去的记忆，”摄影师莎伦·布伦斯说。

examination_example.sentence: Critics say the digital access codes <highlight>represent</highlight> the same profit-seeking ethos (观念) of the textbook business, and are even harder for students to opt out of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批评家说，数字访问密码代表着与教科书行业相同的营利精神观念，甚至更难让学生选择退出。

examination_example.sentence: The textbook industry insists the online systems <highlight>represent</highlight> a better deal for students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书行业坚持认为，在线系统对学生而言是更好的选择。

examination_example.sentence: These companies, which long reaped big profits as textbook publishers, have boasted that their new online offerings, when pushed to students through universities they partner with, <highlight>represent</highlight> the future of the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些长期以来一直作为教科书出版商，并获得丰厚利润的公司吹嘘说，当他们通过与他们合作的大学将其推向学生时，他们的新在线产品代表了该行业的未来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Some of them have layers (层次) of meanings and have been designed to <highlight>represent</highlight> real-life experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些具有多层含义，旨在代表现实生活中的经历。

examination_example.sentence: While emoji are simple symbols that <highlight>represent</highlight> an emotion, stickers are made up of many parts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表情符号是代表一种情绪的简单符号，而贴纸则由许多部分组成。

examination_example.sentence: At that time trains were subjects that could keep people’s interest and <highlight>represented</highlight> modern progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那个时候，火车是可以保持人们的兴趣和代表现代进步的主题。
